price: (107) You will not see therein a depression or an elevation."
arabic: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجٗا وَلَآ أَمۡتٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: lā tarā fīhā ʿiwajan walā amtan
